body_html:
That page seems to be for distributed training of estimator. Don't know if distributed training on Keras is supported, cc @fchollet

For distributed training, session needs to be created in a different way, ie, tf.Session("grpc://...."). From your error it looks like keras creates just a regular local session tf.Session()

For distributed training, session needs to be created in a different way, ie, tf.Session("grpc://...."). From your error it looks like keras creates just a regular local session tf.Session()
body:
That page seems to be for distributed training of estimator. Don't know if distributed training on Keras is supported, cc @fchollet 

For distributed training, session needs to be created in a different way, ie, `tf.Session("grpc://....")`. From your error it looks like keras creates just a regular local session `tf.Session()`
